Text.Name: Ls_FirstNoLing
Text.Desc: The Qi of the pet has been exhausted. You have to build the corresponding statue in order to resurrect it, and the process of which will take three days.

Text.Name: Ls_SecLs
Text.Desc: You can only have one pet. This pet will disappear for a while. To summon this pet, you need to build its statue first.

Text.Name: Ls_Outspread_Stability
Text.Desc: Floating dragon is flying high above, with dark clouds, lightning and thunders filling the sky. Those who have done wrongful acts shall be very afraid.

Text.Name: Ls_Outspread_Attractive
Text.Desc: Dark Phoenix hovered in the sky for several days before it fell on top of the main hall, made three long cries and flew away. Most people believe that this is a very good Seven-Slaughtering.
